Title: Relates to a pilot program to increase enrollment, attendance, and success in college for students experiencing homelessness
Summary: Establishes a pilot program under the HESC to increase enrollment, attendance, and success within SUNY/CUNY for students experiencing homelessness.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to a pilot program to increase enrollment, attendance, and success in college for students experiencing homelessness
